snippet.title: Flights suspended as thick fog blankets Melbourne
snippet.content:
All inbound flights and some outbound flights out of Melbourne have been suspended due to a thick fog that has blanketed the city this morning. The Bureau of Meteorology has issued a road weather alert for all Melbourne suburbs with drivers being told to expect delays moving into the city. The State Emergency Service has advised people to reduce speed and maintain a greater distance between them and the vehicle in front of them.
oeˆ️ Fog this morning may cause delays. Passengers are advised to check with their airline for details
A state-wide frost warning also remains in place for most areas of Victoria, with tops of 15 degrees expected once the fog lifts. (C) Nine Digital Pty Ltd 2017
